auth.title: Edifice - ENT HDF Login, access to your school space
password.rules.activation: Your password must contain at least one special character, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and have a minimum length of 6 characters.
password.rules.reset: Your password must contain at least one special character, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and have a minimum length of 6 characters. It must also be different from the previous passwords used.
